BUMP_DESCRIPTION: Shows how to bump to obtain Bump Points to purchase items
GET_DIFFERENT_REWARDS: Press the **Bump** button on our official [Website](https://sofi.gg) to obtain rewards
EMBED_FOOTER: You can use the Bump function every 4 hours!
BUMP_EXTRA_INFO: Shows how to bump to obtain Bump Points to purchase items. With this command you can also see your currently available Bump Points, which can be used on the official Sofi.gg website to purchase items including a Trade Pass
